headline: PayPal Text Payments Push Tests Valuation Discount And Growth Hopes
summary: PayPal Holdings (NasdaqGS:PYPL) has partnered with Authvia to enable payments directly through text and RCS messaging. The integration allows consumers to pay via SMS and RCS without downloading an app or visiting a website. Merchants can use the new capability across billing, service interactions and call centers to collect secure payments in real time. For PayPal, which closed at $52.69, this move comes after a difficult stretch, with the share price down 40.4% over the past year and...

headline: Trump Ally David Sacks Says US 'One Step Closer' To 'Crypto Capital' As Senate Panel Advances Bill
summary: The U.S. Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry voted on Thursday to advance cryptocurrency market structure legislation, moving the bill closer to establishing federal regulations for digital assets. The move has been lauded by prominent figures in the industry, who see it as a vital step in positioning the U.S. as a global leader in crypto innovation. White House Czar Hails ‘Crypto Capital’ Push David Sacks, co-founder of PayPal Holdings Inc (NASDAQ:PYPL), and Brian Armstrong

headline: Cantor Fitzgerald Initiates PayPal (PYPL) Coverage with Neutral Rating and $60 PT
summary: PayPal Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:PYPL) is one of the most undervalued large cap stocks to invest in now. On January 27, Cantor Fitzgerald analyst Ramsey El-Assal initiated coverage of PayPal with a Neutral rating and a $60 price target. headline: Will Crypto Become a Common Payment in Five Years? US Merchants Say Yes
summary: Crypto is moving from “nice-to-have” to checkout option, with 39% of U.S. merchants now accepting it, per a PayPal-backed survey. Customer demand is pushing adoption, ...
